dataModel.name: areaRevegHa
dataModel.description: Area revegetated, e.g. hectares of planting and direct seed sowing.

dataModel.name: totalNumberPlanted
dataModel.description: The number plants planted, excludes direct seeding and natural regeneration.

dataModel.name: totalSeedCollectedKg
dataModel.description: The kg weight of seed collected.

dataModel.name: totalNumberGrown
dataModel.description: Number of individual plants propagated.

dataModel.name: erosionAreaTreated
dataModel.description: The area of erosion works undertaken.

dataModel.name: erosionLength
dataModel.description: The km of stream/coastline over which erosion works have been undertaken.

dataModel.name: areaOfFireHa
dataModel.description: Area over which a controlled burn has been undertaken, e.g. Ecological burn, hazard reduction burn.

dataModel.name: debrisVolumeM3
dataModel.description: Number of cubic metres of rubbish/debris removed from the project area.

dataModel.name: totalSeedSownKg
dataModel.description: Weight (in kilograms) of seed sown in the project area. Species can be listed in the 'Comments field'.

dataModel.name: totalAreaTreatedHa
dataModel.description: The total area where all pest animal control has been undertaken. For some species (such as foxes and rabbits), it includes the area of influence around the actual bait location/line. Do not double count the same area for; (1) work on different species, e.g. 20ha of treatment that targeted foxes and rabbits at a single site is reported as 20ha, not 40ha, or (2)  for follow up treatment. If the initial 20ha is targeted with secondary rounds of treatment, the reported area treated remains 20ha, not the combination of 20ha initial treatment and the 20ha follow up treatment.

dataModel.name: totalPestAnimalsTreatedNo
dataModel.description: The total number of all animals and/or insect colonies killed and/or removed from the project area.

columns.name: pestAnimalsTargetSpecies
columns.description: The pest species targeted for control. Start typing the scientific or common name and the autofill will complete the entry.

dataModel.name: areaTreatedHa
dataModel.description: The total area where weed control has been undertaken. Do not double count (1) the same area for different species or retreatment, e.g 20ha of treatment that targeted Lantana and Camphor laurel at a single site is be reported as 20ha, not 40ha. or (2) follow up treatment. Eg. If the initial 20ha site is targeted with secondary rounds of treatment, the reported area treated remains 20ha, not the combination of the 20ha initial treatment and the 20ha follow up treatment.

columns.name: weedsTargetSpecies
columns.description: The species targeted for control. Start typing a scientific or a common name and autofill will complete the entry).

dataModel.name: totalChangePracticeTreatedArea
dataModel.description: The  hectares of agricultural land where improved management practices have been adopted.

dataModel.name: numberOfEvents
dataModel.description: Number of events held to increase community engagement, such as, training, workshops, planting days, field days, knowledge sharing.

dataModel.name: numberOfPublications
dataModel.description: Number of different publications produced (NOT the number of copies of a publication produced).

dataModel.name: numberOfCommunityGroups
dataModel.description: The number of different community groups participating in the project.

dataModel.name: entitiesAdoptingChange
dataModel.description: The number of farming/fisher entities that adopted management practice change during the project.

dataModel.name: numberOfFarmingEntitiesNew
dataModel.description: The total number of unique farming/fisher entities participating in the project.

dataModel.name: numberOfIndigenousParticipants
dataModel.description: The number of separate/unique Indigenous persons participating in delivery of the project in a voluntary, non-employed capacity.

dataModel.name: totalEmployees
dataModel.description: The number of Indigenous persons employed/sub-contracted during the project (measured in persons, not FTE). Includes ongoing, non-ongoing, casual, and contracted persons.

dataModel.name: indigenousPlansCompleted
dataModel.description: The total number of Indigenous Land and Sea Plans developed by the project.

dataModel.name: indigenousProductsDeveloped
dataModel.description: The total number of publications and other products developed that share Indigenous Ecological Knowledge.

dataModel.name: datasetsShared
dataModel.description: Number of Indigenous ecological knowledge datasets shared or collected.

dataModel.name: indigenousKnowledgeTransferActionsNo
dataModel.description: Number of discrete activities where Indigenous knowledge transfer occurs. E.g. Number of indigenous on-country visits, cultural training sessions. It excludes datasets collected or shared.

dataModel.name: conservationGrazingActionsArea
dataModel.description: The hectare area over which the grazing management regime is changed to obtain primarily ecological benefits. E.g. crash grazing to reduce weeds, use of temporary/limiting grazing and/or a set level of ground cover/sward height to promote seeding/regeneration of native grass or other native species.

dataModel.name: managementPlansNo
dataModel.description: The number of new management plan documents completed and/or the number of existing plans where revisions/updates have been completed. Names and types of plans can be included in your 'project summary' or 'comments on outputs'.

dataModel.name: otherOutputs
dataModel.description: Include here any additional comments you have on your Community Grant projects that do not sit more appropriately elsewhere.

items.source: Complete only the outputs achieved by projects for this reporting period
